column5: For those that use the Q.E.W. between Hamilton and Niagara the skyway bridge is currently closed in both directions due to the high winds. Huge backlog in both directions... The Red Hill Creek expy up to the link then to the 403 will get you around it (and vice-versa).
Thanks for the heads up mike
Heard on the news earlier today that the truck on burlington bridge rolled over and traffic was stopped in one direction.
